item.title: Trump welcomes back teacher released by Russia
item.description: The US president says the "show of good faith" could play a part in ending Russia's war in Ukraine.

item.title: One killed in ballistic missile attack on Kyiv, Ukraine says
item.description: The attack comes after president Zelensky suggested peace negotiations with Russia could include a territory swap.

item.title: Crackdown on Bangladesh protesters may be crime against humanity, UN says
item.description: Sheikh Hasina, deposed last year, is accused of putting down protests that left up to 1,400 people dead.

item.title: Three American goods that could rise in price due to metal tariffs
item.description: Donald Trump's plans for tariffs risk raising prices for items from cars to canned food.

item.title: Goldman axes diversity rule that has 'served purpose'
item.description: The bank ditches a policy that stopped it acting on flotations for firms with an all male, all white board.
